class.name: RID
class.description: The RID type is used to access the unique integer ID of a resource. They are opaque, which means they do not grant access to the associated resource by themselves. They are used by and with the low-level Server classes such as [RenderingServer].

method.name: RID
method.description: Creates a new RID instance with the ID of a given resource. When not handed a valid resource, silently stores the unused ID 0.

method.name: get_id
method.description: Returns the ID of the referenced resource.
